channel.title: MomTalk Podcast
channel.description: Momtalk is the online community radio show produced by Moms for Moms, connecting Moms across Canada and around the world. Join Helen, Cara and Tracy - the parenting team from Canadianparents.com as they talk all things Mom.
channel.itunes:subtitle: MomTalk Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Momtalk is the online community radio show produced by Moms for Moms, connecting Moms across Canada and around the world. Join Helen, Cara and Tracy - the parenting team from Canadianparents.com as they talk all things Mom.
channel.itunes:keywords: IRC, parenting, tips, moms, mommy, Canada, Canadian, community, clubs, family, blogs, parents
channel.itunes:author: CanadianParents.com

image.title: MomTalk Podcast
image.description: A podcast for moms by moms.

item.title: The Ins and Outs of Slow Cooking
item.description: Join Helen, Cara and special guest and CPO Community Member, SarahNB as they discuss the benefits of using a slow cooker for weeknight cooking. Learn more about the CPO Slow Cooker Club, buying a slow cooker, tips & tricks and a whole lot more. Don't miss it!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Ins and Outs of Slow Cooking
item.itunes:summary: Join Helen, Cara and special guest and CPO Community Member, SarahNB as they discuss the benefits of using a slow cooker for weeknight cooking. Learn more about the CPO Slow Cooker Club, buying a slow cooker, tips & tricks and a whole lot more. Don't miss it!
item.itunes:keywords: Meal Planning, Slow Cooker, CrockPot, Crock Pot, Dinner, Cooking
item.itunes:author: Canadian Parents.com

item.title: Real Moms Working from Home: Nathalie Vautour
item.description: Get to know Nathalie Vautour, a real mom who's making her work-from-home dream a reality. Interviewed by Tracy, Nathalie is a Proposal Manager for Bell Aliant.
item.itunes:subtitle: Real Moms Working from Home: Nathalie Vautour

item.title: Real Moms Working from Home: Jennifer Fiander
item.description: Get to know Jennifer Fiander, a real mom who’s making her work-from-home dream a reality. Interviewed by Tracy, this is the third installment of our 12 part series featuring moms across Canada who are earning an income while staying at home. Listen to this podcast and then learn more about Jennifer Fiander at Lil’ Angel Gifts.

item.title: The Perfect Staycation
item.description: The urban dictionary defines staycation as "a vacation that is spent at one's home or close to home, enjoying all that your environment has to offer". What would your perfect staycation look like? Join us as we discuss some practical and inspiring ideas.

item.title: Stacy Julian on Photo Freedom
item.description:
If you feel like you are drowning in piles of photos and have a computer crammed with digital images that haven't made it to the printer, you won't want to miss this show!
Join Helen as she chats with Stacy Julian, founding editor of Simple Scrapbooks Magazine and the author of the much anticipated, Photo Freedom.

item.title: Date Night @ Home
item.description: When was the last time you and your husband went on a date? No kids, no distractions – time together to talk and enjoy one another’s company? Can't remember? Can't get out? Listen in... today's show is all about Date Night at Home! With a little creativity and a relaxed attitude you will be reconnecting in the comfort of your home.

item.description: Receiving a diagnosis of "unexplained infertility" can strike terror into your heart if you want to be a parent. Listen in as Hynotherapist and EFT Practitionist Kathleen Milligan explains how her techniques can maximize your chances of conceiving naturally.

item.title: Autism Spectrum Disorders
item.description: An interview with our CPO Occupational Therapist Expert, Linna Tam. Linna discusses the common disorders that fall under the autism spectrum umbrella and how occupational therapy can benefit children affected by this disorder. One of the biggest obstacles facing parents of autistic children in Canada, lack of services, is examined and Linna shares a few tips for navigating the system.

item.title: Scrapbooking: What are you missing?
item.description: Join us as we talk about one of our favourite hobbies - scrapbooking! We'll share what we like most about this hobby and how it has helped us become more aware of what is happening in our lives. From photos to supplies, tools and tips, we will help to inspire you to enjoy this hobby and make it part of your life.
